Package com.ansi.scilla.common.queries

Class QuoteSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ansi.scilla.common.ApplicationObject
      • com.ansi.scilla.common.queries.QueryResult
        • com.ansi.scilla.common.queries.QuoteSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class QuoteSearch
extends QueryResult
    This url searches the following quote search query fields for the search term: +" "+ - manager name +" "+ - manager name +", "+ - manager name + - address 1 from the job_site_address_id and returns these same fields plus: quote.* division.* manager_name - +" "+ bill_to_name job_site_address job_site_name quote_job_count - count of jobs on the quote quote_ppc_sum - sum of the PPCs for the jobs on the quote The url for get will be one of: /quoteSearch (retrieves all records from contact table) /quoteSearch?term= (returns all records containing ) /quoteSearch?term=&sort=,... The servlet will return all records if there is no "term=" found.
    Author:
    gagroce
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
